title: Breakfast Club Revolts Against Revolt
itunes:title: Breakfast Club Revolts Against Revolt
description:
Tuesday 3/22- Today on the show after false news came out about The Breakfast Club being racist, the personalities had no problem calling B.S on the B.S. In fact Charalamagne gave Donkey of the Day to the writer of the “Daily News”, Stephen Rex Brown, after he falsely accused The Breakfast Club for such things in the headline. Moreover, Rasheena Phinisee a mother of a child that needed a transplant joined us on the show and Angela also gave some advice to some listeners for Ask Yee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 3/22- Today on the show after false news came out about The Breakfast Club being racist, the personalities had no problem calling B.S on the B.S. In fact Charalamagne gave Donkey of the Day to the writer of the “Daily News”, Stephen Rex Brown, after he falsely accused The Breakfast Club for such things in the headline. Moreover, Rasheena Phinisee a mother of a child that needed a transplant joined us on the show and Angela also gave some advice to some listeners for Ask Yee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
